entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
